summary: Mjol with slight changes in appearence
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=YELLOW]BRAND NEW CREATION KIT VERSION ADDED - MUCH PRETTIER NOW! [/COLOR]

No meshes to add now, just a single .esp file!

[COLOR=RED]Dark Hair Mjol[/COLOR]
===============

Here is my preferred option for the companion Mjol. I\'ve only slightly tweaked very few options to achieve a different look for this character.

Changes to Mjol are:

* Dark hair
* No scar
* Better complexion
* Brown eyes


She still retains her war paint, and nothing else is changed to affect gamepay or other characters.

[COLOR=RED]NOTE:[/COLOR] My game has a few mods now, so your character will differ from mine in the image. She will still have the afformentioned changes though.

Kind regards,
Mike

Here\'s a list of mods I have installed that affect the characters appearance.
This is for those that asked when looking at my image what I had used at the time.

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* AOF Believable Hair[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Better Females by Bella Version 3[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Caliente Female Body Mod Slim Body Edition[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Caliente Body Feet and Hands Slim[/COLOR]
As above (same link)

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Improved NPC Clothing[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX Beta 10i PureENB[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4463

Credit goes to the original authors of the above mods.

===============
MY MODS SO FAR
===============

[COLOR=YELLOW]Prettier Mjol (new CK version added)[/COLOR]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5753


[COLOR=YELLOW]Sylgja Tavern Wench Outfit[/COLOR]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5756


[COLOR=YELLOW]Empty Shack in Whiterun[/COLOR]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8114


[COLOR=YELLOW]Crystal Rock Home[/COLOR]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9587

[COLOR=YELLOW]HallGate Mansion[/COLOR]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12121
